page.title: 14THE BURNTSTUMP PUB.
page.content: The{pub}is just off the Burntstump hill.With its old fashioned looks it attracts many customers.It was{built in 1856 and it was first used as a house,but in 1977 it opened as a pub.It is a very popular spot with 5-600 customers a day.The most popular drink is{Bitter}at 75p a pint from the {Mansfield}brewery.The most popular night is Saturday,but often there are {fancy dress nights eg.tarts and {vicars,wild west,and tramp evenings. There is also a{restaurant}with 42 {meals}on the menu each day.The{chef}is called Vince Bramhall and it takes him only 1.5 hrs. to make a{Sunday dinner with all the trimmings.The Burntstump has its own special{soup}made traditionally with meat,veg,herbs and a thickening stock.The pub has many future{plans}like a new{family {room,refurbishing}and a{play area.
